mapper.select: select comm_no,comm_cate_nm, comm_date, comm_title, comm_content, comm_hitno, mid from community order by comm_date desc
select comm_no,comm_cate_nm, comm_date, comm_title, comm_content, comm_hitno, mid ,comm_cate_nm, comm_cate_no from community where comm_cate_no = '1' order by comm_date desc
select comm_no,comm_cate_nm, comm_date, comm_title, comm_content, comm_hitno, mid ,comm_cate_nm, comm_cate_no from community where comm_cate_no = '2' order by comm_date desc
select comm_no,comm_cate_nm, comm_date, comm_title, comm_content, comm_hitno, mid ,comm_cate_nm, comm_cate_no from community where comm_cate_no = '3' order by comm_date desc
select comm_no,comm_cate_nm, comm_date, comm_title, comm_content, comm_hitno, mid ,comm_cate_nm, comm_cate_no from community where comm_cate_no = '4' order by comm_date desc

SELECT review.review_no, class_cate.class_cate_nm, class.class_cate_no, review_star, review.review_date, review.review_title, review.review_content, review.review_hitno, review.mid FROM REVIEW, CLASS , class_cate WHERE CLASS.CLASS_NO= review.class_no and class.class_cate_no=class_cate.class_cate_no order by review_date desc

select review_no,class_cate_nm,class_cate_no,review_star,review_date,review_title,review_content,review_hitno,mid from( SELECT r.review_no, ca.class_cate_nm, c.class_cate_no, r.review_star, r.review_date, r.review_title, r.review_content, r.review_hitno, r.mid FROM REVIEW r, CLASS c, class_cate ca WHERE c.CLASS_NO= r.class_no and c.class_cate_no=ca.class_cate_no) where class_cate_no=1 order by review_date desc

select review_no,class_cate_nm,class_cate_no,review_star,review_date,review_title,review_content,review_hitno,mid from( SELECT r.review_no, ca.class_cate_nm, c.class_cate_no, r.review_star, r.review_date, r.review_title, r.review_content, r.review_hitno, r.mid FROM REVIEW r, CLASS c, class_cate ca WHERE c.CLASS_NO= r.class_no and c.class_cate_no=ca.class_cate_no) where class_cate_no=2 order by review_date desc

select review_no,class_cate_nm,class_cate_no,review_star,review_date,review_title,review_content,review_hitno,mid from( SELECT r.review_no, ca.class_cate_nm, c.class_cate_no, r.review_star, r.review_date, r.review_title, r.review_content, r.review_hitno, r.mid FROM REVIEW r, CLASS c, class_cate ca WHERE c.CLASS_NO= r.class_no and c.class_cate_no=ca.class_cate_no) where class_cate_no=3 order by review_date desc

select mnick,mpro_img,review_title,review_content from ( select rownum as rnum,mnick,mpro_img,review_title, review_content from ( select member.mnick, member.mpro_img, review_title, review_content from review, member where review.class_no = #{class_no} and member.mid = review.mid order by review_date desc) ) where rnum <= 2
